name: Super Duper Thwackswinger
description:
MOVE WITH MOUSE, GRAB NEAREST BALL WITH LEFT BUTTON
OR USE RIGHT BUTTON FOR MANUAL AIMING

THWACK BALLS TOGETHER FOR POINTS
THWACK CONTINUOUSLY TO BUILD COMBO MULTIPLIER

THWACKING WITH A THROWN BALL SCORES DOUBLE
RECATCH A THROWN BALL FOR A THREE-POINT BONUS

THWACK THE TWINKLY BALL FOR AN EXTRA LIFE

HAPPY THWACKSWINGING!

this is the ~*ultimate evolution*~ of a game I made for Klik of the Month Klub and Ludum Dare simultaneously and then kept working on slowly, and which was eventually included in the 2012 IGF Pirate Kart. was gonna polish it up and make it, like... not be a low-res fullscreen windows-only app. but then I didn't, so that's what this is. enjoy!
